documentation.title: KoolImageView Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php image view, php image zoom, zoom image script
documentation.metadescription: KoolImageView provides perfect solution for image detail view in your online store or images collection. KoolImageView is equipped with many nice templates and effects. And it is Totally FREE!

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set the id for KoolImageView.
property.longdesc: Get or set the id for KoolImageView. This id will be use as variable name of KoolImageView at client-side.
property.samplecode:
<?php
	$kiv->id="kiv";
	//We usually use the same id name with server-side for better reference. 
?>

property.name: styleFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolImageView.
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolImageView.

property.name: scriptFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain core file "koolimageview.php"
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain core file "koolimageview.php". Normally the path to script folder is automatically added, however in some cases you may need to set it manually.

property.name: imageUrl
property.shortdesc: Get or set url of small image
property.longdesc: Get or set url of small image

property.name: cssClass
property.shortdesc: Get or set the css class for small image.
property.longdesc: Get or set the css class for small image.

property.name: bigImageUrl
property.shortdesc: Get or set url of big image
property.longdesc: Get or set url of big image

property.name: effect
property.shortdesc: Get or set the tranformed effect of ImageView.
property.longdesc: Get or set the tranformed effect of ImageView.

property.name: backgroundOpacity
property.shortdesc: Get or set background transparent level.
property.longdesc: Get or set background transparent level. The background will be disabled if you set backgroundOpacity to 0.

property.name: openTime
property.shortdesc: Get or set time duration to open ImageView
property.longdesc: Get or set time duration to open ImageView

property.name: frameNumber
property.shortdesc: Get or set number of frames rendering when imageview opens or closes
property.longdesc: Get or set number of frames rendering when imageview opens or closes

property.name: showLoading
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether loading text/image will be shown when big image is loaded. By default showLoading has true value.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether loading text/image will be shown when big image is loaded. By default showLoading has true value.

property.name: description
property.shortdesc: Get or set text description for big image
property.longdesc: Get or set text description for big image
property.samplecode: <?php $kiv->description="This is the big image!";//Set description for big image ?>

property.name: zIndex
property.shortdesc: Get or set zIndex layer for ImageView.
property.longdesc: Get or set zIndex layer for ImageView. This property is helpful when you want to set ImageZoom above all of your elements in your page.

property.name: position

value.desc: Open big image in the center of screen
Expand big image equally in all direction from small image

property.shortdesc: Get or set position type for imagezoom
property.longdesc: Get or set position type for imagezoom

property.name: relativeLeft
property.shortdesc: Get or set left postion of zoompanel relative to small image
property.longdesc: Get or set left postion of zoompanel relative to small image

property.name: relativeTop
property.shortdesc: Get or set top postion of zoompanel relative to small image
property.longdesc: Get or set top postion of zoompanel relative to small image
